title: Welcome to Send His Word
excerpt: A quick introduction to our mission, livestream, and community.
contentHtml: Welcome! We’re honored you’re here. Explore our livestream, request prayer, and connect with groups as we grow in Christ together.
author: SHWM Team

title: August Ministry Update
excerpt: Highlights from August: worship night, outreach, and testimonies.
contentHtml: God moved powerfully in August! From worship nights to outreach, we witnessed lives touched and hearts encouraged.
author: Pastoral Team
